scripts.dev: cross-env NUXT_TELEMETRY_DISABLED=1 NODE_ENV=development nodemon server/index.js --watch server
scripts.devApi: cross-env NUXT_TELEMETRY_DISABLED=1 NODE_ENV=development DEV_API=1 PORT=3010 nodemon server/index.js --watch server
scripts.start: cross-env NUXT_TELEMETRY_DISABLED=1 NODE_ENV=production HOST=127.0.0.1 PORT=3000 node server/index.js
